text:
Update as promised: our teen w/ a severe #peanutallergy has gotten 2 doses of Pfizer #COVID19 #vaccine w/ no allergic reaction. Grateful to all who helped to develop these vaccines & joined #clinicaltrials. #VaccinesWork #ScienceWillWin 🙏

#ThisIsOurShot: https://t.co/RlL6ujlCNT https://t.co/KsahZGb1v3
